name: styleguide-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate KSS node styleguide implementation for projects.

scripts.generate-styleguide: ./node_modules/.bin/kss-node scss --template styleguide/caxy-template --css ../css/main.css --custom devnotes --custom hidemarkup --custom patterntype --custom containspatterns
scripts.generate-styleguide-verbose: ./node_modules/.bin/kss-node scss --template styleguide/caxy-template --css ../css/main.css --verbose --custom devnotes --custom hidemarkup --custom patterntype --custom containspatterns

author: Beck Kramer
